Name: The Legend of The Sacred Stone EX
About the game: The Legend of The Sacred Stone EX is a classic action role-playing game authorized by Pili International Multimedia, and will be launched on the same date with its movie. The story in this game is an adaptation of the movie, and in order to make the players experience its hype and tense of the authentic Taiwanese hand puppet show, the develop team decided to make it as an action role-playing game. Players can play as 素還真and explore the Jianghu with his teammates 青陽子,葉小釵,亂世狂刀 and 劍君十二恨, and reveal the evil fights and secrets of the martial world. Players can also interact with those popular characters like 傲笑紅塵,一線生and 秦假仙in this game. By playing it, fans can review the story as well and have an immersive experience like watching the movie. The story starts from a host of the 鳴劍山莊, his family had been slaughtered and he became antisocial and anti-society, renamed himself as ”骨皮先生”. He lived with his royal guards in ruins and planned for the revenge. He used the relationship between his daughter 劍如冰and 傲笑紅塵for the天問石, a sacred stone represented as a symbol of new technology and infinite power. Not only all parties were pursuing it, but also those unknown creatures. The Jianghu started to be in chaos ever since. For the truth and chasing the source, 素還真started to investigate with 青陽子, a brother from another mother, but this was how they put themselves in lethal dangers... Eight Main Features of The Legend of The Sacred Stone EX High Definition Remastered of The Movie Includes over 27 minutes high definition remastered resolution scenes from the movie The Legend of The Sacred Stone. Contains splendid effect of martial skills, and with its delicate storytelling and the voice setting, fans can have an immersive experience by playing the game. Customize Your Team in Will Change your teammates during battles, play as the main character 素還真and fight with 青陽子,葉小釵,亂世狂刀and 劍君十二恨in the Jianghu. Fight against骨皮先生and stop the evils. Utilize 藥水with 批次堆疊 Smooth supply on 生命and內力（紅藍）, there won’t be messy windows. Charge your enemy and no need to worry about the supplements in battles. Speed up the 馬力of characters, which enable to move 200% faster in battlefields, and 300% faster in safe zones. Even a novice can get started with the simple and intuitive operations. Readjustment on Skills and Balance Recreate those classic skills of the heroes like ”一人三化” and “怒火燒盡九重天” of 素還真;千里神彈of 青陽子; 天地根of 狂刀;般若懺of 葉小釵;五行劍陣of 劍君十二恨. Effects of them are also superb and splendid. Besides, balanced the skills of teammates and enemies to make a better sustainability of the game. New八卦迷蹤步of 素還真 With holding down Shift key and click on direction can use八卦迷蹤步. Utilize 八卦迷蹤步with other skills, battles can be ever-changing. It helps to dodge strikes from the enemies, and also makes your training more interesting. New Map Feature for Recognition Recreate the movie scenery in the game, and it will be easy to find your direction through the new map feature and its display, dive in the true Jianghu of The Legend of The Sacred Stone. Multiple Hot Keys Multiple new hot keys added, which allows changing teammates, switching manual to auto mode, and also on shifting skills or items. An adaptation of the movie. And the voice was presented by Vincent Huang, a genius of the eight categories musical instrument in Chinese ancient orchestra. With its stunning and splendid skill effects, delicate storytelling, and its outstanding scenery switching, YOU will enjoy a classic made of Pili International Multimedia - The Legend of The Sacred Stone EX.
